segments.text: I need to take a few classes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of classes would you like to take ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , you're going to need to make an appointment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't understand why I need to make an appointment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You need to make one to come down and fill out your paperwork .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to make one now if I could .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure you can ; when would you like to come in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to come in tomorrow morning at 9
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's great . Thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S2
